This directory contains source code of external Go packages that Azul3D uses.

It should be strictly noted that all software in this directory is licensed
under it's own, seperate, original license, and as such you are required to
abide by the license described within the respective package documentation.

For your convenience we list an link to each license that each package is licensed
under.

(Developers note: Only code within Azul3D should use these packages, other
software outside of Azul3D should use the packages original import path.)



Package; "resize";
  URL: http://code.google.com/p/appengine-go/source/browse/example/moustachio/resize/

  License; "Apache License, Version 2.0";
    URL: http://code.google.com/p/appengine-go/source/browse/LICENSE



Package; "freetype-go";
  URL: https://code.google.com/p/freetype-go/

  Note: You may choose either one of the licenses listed below.
    FreeType License is similar to the original BSD license.

  License choice one; "FreeType License";
    URL: https://freetype-go.googlecode.com/hg/licenses/ftl.txt

  License choice two; "GNU General Public License (GPL), version 2 or later";
    URL: https://freetype-go.googlecode.com/hg/licenses/gpl.txt
